definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: groan (onomatop. acc. to Thes; NH Hiph. bleat, so Ar. b9y, bgy Dozy; Aram. [[פְּעָא]] p9o0 bleat,);—Impf. 1 s. [[כַּיּוֹלֵדָה אֶפְעֶה]] Is 42:14 (of ´[[י]] staining himself to deliver Isr., + [[אֶשּׁׂם]] [[[נשׁם]]], [[אֶשְׁאַף]]).—[[[אֶפַע]]] Is 41:26. v.p. 67.
